title: An Uptick in Elder Poverty: A Blip, or a Sign of Things to Come?
description: Seniors didn’t fare as well through the pandemic as most. But longer-term trends aren’t moving in their favor, either.
dc:creator: Lydia DePillis and Mike Belleme
media:description: Juanita Brown, 77, has had to do without things like replacing her dentures or replenishing her heating oil.
